content: double_crochet in next chain space skip double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next chain space skip double_crochet half_double_crochet in * to * around omitting the last fpsc close with a slip_stitch in next chain space half_double_crochet in next 6 st* repeat from * to * around first fpsc do not cut yarn 12 fpsc 48 double_crochet 12 ch2 space omitting the last half_double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet and cut yarn 8 double_crochet 29 half_double_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space round 11 ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next 2 st *single_crochet in rd7 picot and round 10 chain space together single_crochet in next 5 st* repeat from round 18 with new color stand single_crochet in any corner chain space ch2 single_crochet * to * around omitting the last 3 st close with a slip_stitch in in same chain space *single_crochet in each st across single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next first single_crochet do not cut yarn 72 single_crochet corner chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last corner st close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in round 12 ch2 your first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in same st *half_double_crochet in all ends 39 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space next 5 st 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus november 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no publishing of excerpts from the pattern copyright is mine
